docs.title: Home
docs.text:
Welcome to the official The Story Of A Succubus Named Candice wiki site.

A game by Pikakid98 Games

Please be aware that this version is no longer being worked on.

docs.title: Changelog
docs.text: [⚪ Change or update] [🔵 Bug fix] [🔴 Game crash fix]

docs.title: v0.7a
docs.text:
⚪ Updated the company icon (Adding Pika's horn)
⚪ Added a settings menu
⚪ Added large choices script
⚪ Added new options on the launcher
⚪ Added Discord Link
⚪ Added config options
⚪ Changed launcher icons
⚪ Temporarily removed buy full version option
⚪ Moved changelog to the in-game launcher
⚪ Moved "End Of Demo" point
⚪ Removed orb pick up cutscene (Because copyright)
⚪ Removed unused files
⚪ Game now saves to Appdata\Roaming

docs.title: v0.6a
docs.text:
⚪ Changed the theme of the pause menu (WIP)
⚪ All rares have a chance to drop hearty apples
⚪ Made all bosses events instead of tiles
⚪ Finally finished Etera Ice Fortress
⚪ Retraced path with carpet on world map
⚪ Added some things to the world map

docs.title: v0.5.2a
docs.text: ⚪ Fixed some typos (report any i missed, please)

docs.title: v0.5.1a
docs.text:
⚪ Changed the game's icon
🔵 Exiting Etera early now removes the orb item
⚪ Changed the location of the first world map
⚪ Important items now go into new Key Items slot
⚪ ▓▓▓ replaced with ???
⚪ Changed a bit more of the dialogue
⚪ Changed the meeting dialogue of Erica
⚪ Typo fixes
⚪ New secret area spot's appearance (when found)
🔴 Fixed a few softlock errors
⚪ Removed old secret
⚪ Finished changing the dialogue

docs.title: v0.5a
docs.text:
⚪ Player now starts with a stick
⚪ Nerfed Rick again
⚪ Added "Name Above Text" script
⚪ Changed intro image
⚪ Removed dev viewer in launcher
⚪ Diagonal movement added
⚪ Enemies now display their remaining HP
⚪ Removed Gamejolt achievements
⚪ Changed some map layouts
⚪ Removed the level display names
⚪ Changed launcher menu for... special reasons ;)
⚪ Some unimportant dialogue has been removed
⚪ Slightly tweaked some dialogue 
⚪ Removed some unviewable "Alpha" dialogue
🔵 Changed some transfer player locations
⚪ It's mandatory to speak with Rick in Vilam Plaza
⚪ Corrected grammar in Ch. 1
⚪ Developer section removed
⚪ Story Mode is now called "Candice's Story"
⚪ Added URL opening warning on "Bug Report"
⚪ Added some pauses in between dialogue
⚪ Added a new outcome to Vilam Plaza

docs.title: v0.4.6a

docs.title: v0.2a

docs.title: v0.1
docs.text: Initial release

docs.title: Story
docs.text:
○ Once you have exited the room keep walking right until you see a large empty space and walk to it.
○ Keep walking right until you see a red haired girl and talk to her.
○ Once you have reached the island just simply enter the cave on the far left.
○ Simply battle the succubus. Whether you win or lose has no effect. Both end in the same result.
○ Now once again walk to the door on the left
○ Walk all the way to the right
○ Talk to the red haired girl
○ Return back by simply walking into the area of the ship that sticks out
○ To return to your room just enter the open area of which you started
○ Next you must leave your room through the same door on the left
○ Walk all the way right
○ Now you must climb the rope next to the crew deck and talk to the red haired girl

docs.title: Story
docs.text:
○ Start off by interacting with the chest on the bottom right corner to enable dashing then go for the door
○ Go to the stairs then keep going down
○ Go to the right and talk to Rose (The little girl)
○ Go up and battle Rick and his soldiers
○ Go to the plaza and exit straight away (Or explore)

docs.title: Achievements
docs.text:
○ PurrCatory Fan
    After the 1st battle against Rick and his soldiers go back to Rose’s house and go into the room on the north-west side and interact with what looks like a table with a purple cloth on it (This is meant to be a TV. But it's currently a placeholder)

○ Cat Party
    Talk to Rick in Vilam Plaza and Interact with the cat. This will not work without getting PurrCatory weapon set

docs.title: Story
docs.text:
○ After the cutscene ends you need to grab the world map. You must go to the beach and pick the world map up from the chest there
○ After that you leave and then you need to talk to the girl with the pink hair and she will tell you about her problems
○ Go into the caves and flip the switches
○ Go to Maria’s house to get the key
○ Take her key to the shed on the left side of the right island
○ Beat Arkata (It is recommended to be Level 6 with everyone)

docs.title: Secrets
docs.text:
○ It is recommended to farm up in the hidden area in Crevace Caves before going through the boss battle.

    To find it you must take this path from the exit:

    ○ 7 Down
    ○ 5 Left
    ○ 3 Up
    ○ 7 Left
    ○ 4 Up
    ○ 1 Left
    Then hit enter

docs.title: Achievements
docs.text:
○ Lamia Lynched
    Defeat the first boss

○ Treasure In The Desert
    Once on the 5th area go to the right and look for a tiny change in the sand. Go here and find the ancient chest

○ GG, Developer, GG
    In the name input for the desert statue type the name “Jordan” (This is the name of the developer.)

docs.title: Story
docs.text:
○ Go straight up. That’s it
○ In order to find the bandit’s hideout you must locate the disturbed sand leading to the correct path (Choosing the wrong path leads back to the start)
○ After arriving at a temple you must go right as the door is locked tight
○ Walk up to get to the hideout
○ Traverse through the path of iron fences to reach the golden floor area
○ Battle the imps and rescue the girl
○ Leave and go back to the temple

docs.title: Achievements
docs.text:
○ Kerberos Krushed
    Defeat the second boss

docs.title: Story
docs.text:
○ You will come across a locked stone door. 4 two headed dragon symbols and 5 different chests. You must pick the small red one. The others are traps. This is a greed test
○ Once the test is complete simply walk to the stairs

○ Next you must navigate the labyrinth pictured here >

docs.title: Picture
docs.text:
○ Next. Simply go right
○ Keep going
○ Enter the tent (Dislaimer: This is a placeholder)
○ Next go up then keep going left
○ Push the pillar from the bottom 4 times
○ Go back to the tent (Dislaimer: This is a placeholder)
○ Return to the orb to collect it
○ Go up and place the orb on the dark patch on the water
○ Return to past Etera and go back to the ice fortress
○ Go down the stairs

docs.title: Etera Ice Fortress
docs.text:
○ First locate the first set of stairs and go down them
○ Next go left and at the first turn to go down… Well… Go down
○ Find your way around the “Maze” and enter the time warp tent (Dislaimer: This is a placeholder)
○ Return back the way you came and go up the stairs
○ Go back to where the first set of stairs are but instead go to the path below
○ Flip the switch
○ Go back to where you found the time warp tent and use it again (Dislaimer: This is a placeholder)
○ Leave the area once again and go to the area on the far left of the 1F stairs
○ Keep going down
○ Flip the second switch
○ Go back to the time warp tent (Dislaimer: This is a placeholder)
○ Return to the area with the first switch.. The path should now be open
○ Make your way through the maze and enter the next time warp tent (Dislaimer: This is a placeholder)
○ Follow the path and go down the stairs
○ Flip the final switch
○ Leave and go through the time warp tent (Dislaimer: This is a placeholder)
○ Now return to the first floor to the newly opened area (Only works in the past)
○ The following boss recommends either Level 10-11+ in addition to stocking up on weapons and armour

docs.title: Secrets
docs.text: ○ The area past the ladders. Go below the large crack and keep hitting enter

docs.title: Achievements
docs.text:
○ Evilking Eradicated
    Defeat the third boss
